concept.title: CC-102 Army Contracting Enterprise Strategic Objectives.

conbody.p: In accordance with FAR 1.102(b), the ACE defines its operations, reporting, and compliance strategic objectives for contracting as follows:
a. Satisfy the customer in terms of cost;
b. Satisfy the customer in terms of quality; and
c. Satisfy the customer in terms of timeliness.
(2) Reporting objective. Conduct business with openness.
